channel.title: Best thing thats ever happend to you
channel.description: whats the best thing thats ever happend to you? my first blow job :cool:

item.title: Best thing thats ever happend to you
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:400832”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497888.msg3641937#msg3641937 date=1309063961]

Giving my friend will a blow job.

Wanna come over?

OT: Apart from sex related things, the wonderful 6 days I thought I would have a baby, I worked so hard that week finding a better job that I now make twice at for working half the hours (even though I’m still working 16 hour days) because I thought I would have to support a family. Now it turned out great cause I can actually take time off. =D
[/quote]Oh yeah Andrew…forgot to tell you man…I’m having a baby and it’s yours yeah i did the math and all…and yeah…[/quote]
Oh drat, all that butt sex came back to haunt us. Lol

Read full topic
item.source: Best thing thats ever happend to you

item.title: Best thing thats ever happend to you
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

well since im a virgin i can say anything about that my ex is both the best and worst things thats happened to me. best because when i was with her everything was awesome and well. now shes the worst b/c she wants me to move on b/c she says i can do better than her and she doesnt want to hurt me anymore; she still is in love with my friend, who wants nothing to do with her(my mom and i believe he got what he wanted)…

Read full topic

@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

Since some have said sex already, I’ll say my first kiss. You get that feeling in your stomach and it’s really awesome. Best way to describe it. ;]

item.title: Best thing thats ever happend to you
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:14, topic:400832”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=497888.msg3641044#msg3641044 date=1309015254]
Giving my friend will a blow job.
[/quote]
Wanna come over?

OT: Apart from sex related things, the wonderful 6 days I thought I would have a baby, I worked so hard that week finding a better job that I now make twice at for working half the hours (even though I’m still working 16 hour days) because I thought I would have to support a family. Now it turned out great cause I can actually take time off. =D[/quote]
If my GF doesn’t cool it I may be in that situation lol.

@Topic - Probably moving to Mississippi. I was putting in applications for 2 years in stores that I could find, none ever called me. Decided to move back to MS and I had a job landed 2 weeks before even moving down here. As well as getting my current GF, shes kinda getting me out of the virtual world and back into the country lifestyle I once had. Feels good lol.
